mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_EMPLOYEE_T.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE_T ( EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_PW, EMP_NAME, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, EMP_PROFILE, EMP_STAT, FRN_NO, POS_NO) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{empId}, #{empPw}, #{empName}, #{empEmail}, #{empPhone}, #{empProfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empStat, typeHandler=com.mcp.crispy.common.typehandler.EmpStatusTypeHandler}, 0, #{posNo, typeHandler=com.mcp.crispy.common.typehandler.PositionTypeHandler} )
